headline: Warner Bros gets mostly cash offer from Netflix in new bidding round - Bloomberg
summary: Investing.com -- Warner Bros Discovery Inc (NASDAQ:WBD) is currently reviewing a second round of bids, including a predominantly cash offer from Netflix Inc (NASDAQ:NFLX), Bloomberg reports, as part of an auction process that could conclude within days or weeks.

raw.headline: Warner Bros gets mostly cash offer from Netflix in new bidding round - Bloomberg

headline: Netflix Makes Mostly Cash Offer for Warner Bros.
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery was fielding a second round of bids on Monday, including a mostly cash offer from Netflix Inc., in an auction that could wrap up in the coming days or weeks, according to people familiar with the discussions. Chris Palmeri has more on "Bloomberg The Close."

raw.headline: Netflix Makes Mostly Cash Offer for Warner Bros.

headline: Netflix Co-CEO Ted Sarandos to Participate in the UBS Global TMT Conference
summary: Netflix, Inc. (Nasdaq: NFLX) announced today that Ted Sarandos, Co-CEO, will participate in a fireside discussion at the UBS Global TMT Conference on Monday, December 8, 2025. The session will begin at 11:15 a.m. Pacific Time / 2:15 p.m. Eastern Time.

headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks with Promising Prospects
summary: Stocks that outperform the market usually share key traits such as rising sales, expanding margins, and increasing returns on capital. The select few that can do all three for many years are often the ones that make you life-changing money.

headline: Suitors submit offers for Warner Bros. Discovery: Puck's Matt Belloni on what to expect
summary: Matt Belloni, Puck founding partner, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss the latest developments in the bid for Warner Bros. Discovery, who the top suitors are, potential regulatory hurdles, and more.
